title: FIT President on Launching Social Justice Center
itunes:title: FIT President on Launching Social Justice Center
description:
Dr. Joyce Brown, President of the Fashion Institute of Technology (FIT), discusses creating the Social Justice Center to foster diversity and inclusivity in the fashion industry.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
